title: Flash crash
description: When Abby Churchland, a highly skilled CIA covert operative, uncovers the truth behind the Wall Street "flash crash," she is put in the crosshairs and targeted for death by the very government she serves.Suddenly, the hunter becomes the hunted, but she's smart, brutal, and lethally efficient.And if you are in her sights, fear her!FLASH CRASH is a fast-paced, action-filled thriller that was inspired by actual events that took place in the US stock market on May 6, 2010.
author: K.R. Harris
